answers.answer: Hi there!You sugar levels are perfectly fine and there is no indication to worry about diabetes. Increased thirst and urination can also be caused due to dehydration, hormonal/ endocrine issues, infections, side effect of a few medications etc. If it is excessive, you may like to get this evaluated by a primary care physician.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: hi im 23 years old been really thirsty and urinating about 8 times a day, took my glucos level with my stemoms machine in the morning came out 87 the ate 2 hours later came out to 107 am i at risk to diabetes
title: heeeeelp
